name: @mirawision/imagine
description: Deterministic random data generator for mocks, seeds, demos, and tests.
author: Yelysei Lukin <yelysei277@gmail.com>

scripts.clean: rimraf index.* number.js number.d.ts boolean.js boolean.d.ts id.js id.d.ts string.js string.d.ts util.js util.d.ts images.js images.d.ts location.js location.d.ts person.js person.d.ts date.js date.d.ts internet.js internet.d.ts color.js color.d.ts game.js game.d.ts build
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && mv build/index.js index.js && mv build/index.d.ts index.d.ts && mv build/number/index.js number.js && mv build/number/index.d.ts number.d.ts && mv build/boolean/index.js boolean.js && mv build/boolean/index.d.ts boolean.d.ts && mv build/id/index.js id.js && mv build/id/index.d.ts id.d.ts && mv build/string/index.js string.js && mv build/string/index.d.ts string.d.ts && mv build/util/index.js util.js && mv build/util/index.d.ts util.d.ts && mv build/images/index.js images.js && mv build/images/index.d.ts images.d.ts && mv build/location/index.js location.js && mv build/location/index.d.ts location.d.ts && mv build/person/index.js person.js && mv build/person/index.d.ts person.d.ts && mv build/date/index.js date.js && mv build/date/index.d.ts date.d.ts && mv build/internet/index.js internet.js && mv build/internet/index.d.ts internet.d.ts && mv build/color/index.js color.js && mv build/color/index.d.ts color.d.ts && mv build/game/index.js game.js && mv build/game/index.d.ts game.d.ts && rimraf build
